/hpc2hdd/home/xhao390/py/urbanclip/data/: The image captures a bustling street scene in Beijing, China. The perspective is from a pedestrian's viewpoint on the sidewalk, immersing the viewer in the city's daily life. The street is lined with a variety of structures, including buildings and trees, creating a sense of depth and scale. A blue fence runs along the side of the street, adding a pop of color to the urban landscape. People can be seen walking on the sidewalk, going about their day, while cars are driving on the road, adding movement and dynamism to the scene. The sky above is hazy, casting a soft light over the cityscape. The image is a snapshot of life in Beijing, encapsulating the city's vibrant energy and architectural diversity.
